comments: This is the second class I\'ve taken of his, and I\'d take a third if I wasn\'t graduating. He is fair, entertaining, and you walk away from his class with some real knowledge. He does a great job connecting real life to class and genuinely cares for his students. You can tell he loves his job and it shows in lecture. A+

comments: Urlacher is by far my favorite professor I\'ve had at UND. He takes the time for every student who needs it. He is very good at understanding personal lives and schedules. He will move deadlines if he feels you are being honest and give an effort in his class. Attendance isn\'t mandatory, however, it is in your best interest to attend.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)

comments: It\'s hard to find a better professor than Dr. Urlacher. His lectures are always top notch and he can make paint drying interesting. He is normally fairly comical as well. I\'ve taken him multiple times and would recommend him to anyone looking at taking one of his classes.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: Interesting lectures and papers. I greatly enjoyed his class and learned a lot from him. He doesn\'t really believe in deadlines as long as you turn it in before the class ends, which is always a plus.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Wow. Best professor on campus, hands down. So unbelievably genuine, warm and intelligent. Always happy to help (or just chat!). His flexibility on deadlines is a godsend. Lectures are such a joy to attend that they don\'t even feel like lectures (if it\'s not a group work or case study day). Take a class with him, I promise you won\'t regret it!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Great lecturer. He tried to make really boring topics as interesting as he could and actually succeeded in it. His tests were extremely easy and you are given a study guide that has exactly what will be on the test.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Urlacher is great. One of the most approachable profs I\'ve ever had-really good-humored, warm, in it for his students. Flexible, but not wout purpose. Lectures are amazing, always has an answer, treats material even-handedly and contextualizes thoroughly & thoughtfully. Class was a lot of writing, but he\'s very wiling to help with it. Super cute.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: AMAZING LECTURES  RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: This was the 2nd time I had Urlacher for a professor. Pols 220 is a very easy class with no tests. There are take home essays. The class is mainly lecture but they are fun to attend. A couple of lab projects in class but nothing too bad. Urlacher is flexible with deadlines. You don\'t really need to read either because there are power points. Easy A.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)

comments: This was the 2nd time I had Urlacher. He really knows the content and his lectures are fun to attend so go to class. No tests but a few quizzes and a few papers. The simulation at the end is very fun too. Urlacher makes foreign policy interesting and I now read a lot of books on the topic. He\'s pretty flexible too with time managment and deadlines.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: He is the best and most interesting lecturer I\'ve ever had. Great to listen to, keeps it interesting and makes sure people understand before moving on. Definitely recommend!

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Brian is a very good professor and he tried very hard to make this class interesting. You\'ll learn how to write a grant and will have to present it at the end of the semester. Otherwise, the class is structured with lectures and group activities. Overall, the class is easy but at the same time the concepts are boring. He provides anecdotes for fun.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: One of the most knowledgeable professors I\'ve had at UND. Has a solid answer to nearly any question you can think of. More writing than other classes but it\'s very manageable because the topics are all interesting. Defintely recommend taking him.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Prof Urlacher is the best Prof I\'ve had at UND. He is passionate and you can tell he loves what he does. Most fair grader I\'ve had in any level of school. East to talk to, responds thoroughly to questions, and is just a joy in class. Take his class.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Professor Urlacher is the best prof I\'ve ever had. He knows the material really well, and is able to relate it modern day examples to make the class more interesting. He is very helpful, clear, and concise. But, he does go off ontangents occasionally. His tests are very straight forward as well, everything comes staright from the studyguide

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Professor Urlacher is the best professor I have had at UND. He is able to get the class involved with his teaching style. He knows how to relate the material back to how it is relevant for us to know it. He is really easy going and very easy to talk to. UND should hire more professors like Dr. Urlacher.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: One of the best lecturers you\'ll ever have. The periodic workshops make sure the students are thinking about the material. His tests aren\'t bad, not the easiest I\'ve had, but if you study you\'ll have no trouble getting an A.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: You can tell that Urlacher is very passionate about foreign policy and that he really knows his stuff. Ask him anything about the subject and he will give a really thorough and satisfying answer. The workshops were also a nice break from the lectures which often grew a bit tedious. He\'s also a really nice guy and graded very fairly as well.

tag_professor: Amazing lectures (8)  Gives good feedback (4)  Respected (4)  Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Get ready to read (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Participation matters (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Great teacher. Topics were really interesting. Loved his workshops that he did in class to keep it from just being lectures. They are also a great way to learn. He had 2 papers and 2-3 tests for grades and his grading was fair and the content on the exams was straightforward. Highly recommended professor!!!

comments: He is the nicest guy. You can tell he is very passionate about what he teaches. His tests are hard, and I think he grades tough. However, he is a good teacher. I would recommend taking a class from him.
